name: Flipper Lava
description:
Lava is rising, and you need to save a little white ball from the highest temperatures! Flip, Roll, Burn, Fire... Yes, you can do a lot of things to escape!

Try the endless procedural mode in this new revisited flipper formula!

You can download the game on Play store for Android (15 MB) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Veinardy.FlipperLava. 

My YouTube channel : https://youtube.com/channel/UC37EjgVAwuoskAy-hfLS9Xw
